A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is not really a Star Wars movie. Disney has created a movie here that will generate a profit and lead the box office for a week or 2 but it is not made for Star Wars fans it’s made for Disney fans who enjoy action movies with lots of bad jokes and a little bit of plot. Star Wars movies are supposed to be more tactful than that\, they can be comedic and full of action in there own way but don’t need to use any and every moment as a poor excuse to make a joke. I’ll give this movie 2 stars because I enjoyed watching about half of it for the childish humor but it felt like and endless battery of terrible cliches that in the end just disappointed me.
